This article is about the farming shop owner. For other Sarahs, see Sarah (disambiguation).

NPC ID501

Sarah is a woman who lives at the farm north of Port Sarim. She owns two dogs, one being a sheepdog. She runs Sarah's Farming shop, which sells farming supplies.

During A Porcine of Interest, she places a bounty on a monster that attacked her, which was discovered to be a sourhog.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Sarah is the solution to the easy cryptic clue: Speak to Sarah at Falador farm.
